description: This file defines an authentication service (`AuthService`) that manages user roles within a Flutter application, providing role-based state management with a singleton pattern and stream notifications.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Singleton service managing user role state with stream broadcasting

classes.name: AppRole
classes.description: Enumeration defining user roles: admin, manager, delivery

methods.name: setRole
methods.description: Sets the current user role and notifies listeners if changed
